name: Pedestrian
description: Pedestrian plugin for the IVP system.

messageTypes.description: Pedestrian Safety Message or Sensor Data Sharing Message used to convey pedestrian location information.

configuration.description: The frequency to send the message, in milliseconds.
IP address at which the web service exists
Port at which Web service exists
Possible data providers we handle - FLIR (websocket), PSM (REST request), or SDSM (REST request)
IP address of the camera to connect to for data
Host HTTP header during the WebSocket handshake
Measured camera rotation from true north (in degrees) used for heading conversion
The log level for this plugin
